title: Real Estate Website
description:
## Overview

Production-grade real estate platform built with the **MERN** stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) and **MUI**. Enables buyers to discover properties via fast search, granular filters, and rich detail pages with agent contact workflows.

### Goals
- Help users find relevant listings quickly with robust search.
- Provide trustworthy, engaging listing pages with complete details.
- Improve lead generation via integrated agent contact forms.

### Key Features
- Faceted search: location, price range, bedrooms, bathrooms, amenities.
- Sort by relevance, newest, price, and proximity.
- Mobile-first UI with responsive image galleries and thumbnails.
- Saved filters and deep-linked, SEO-friendly URLs.

### Architecture
- React + MUI front-end with route-based code splitting.
- Express/Node API for listings, agents, and saved searches.
- MongoDB schemas for `Listing`, `Agent`, and `Inquiry`.
- Image CDN + lazy loading for fast media delivery.

### Data Model (excerpt)
- `Listing`: address, geo, price, beds/baths, amenities, photos.
- `Agent`: profile, contact methods, service area, assigned listings.
- `Inquiry`: listingId, user message, contact info, status.

### UI/UX
- Accessible form controls (WCAG AA).
- Keyboard-friendly gallery; swipe gestures on mobile.
- Consistent theming via MUI and custom palette.

### SEO
- Clean slugs, canonical tags, structured data (JSON-LD).
- Meta tags per listing and city pages.

### Role & Responsibilities
- Designed schema and API endpoints.
- Implemented search/filter UX and gallery.
- Added validation, rate limiting, and request logging.

### Results
- Median page load: < 1.5s on 4G.
- 32% increase in qualified inquiries (pilot).
- Bounce rate improved by 18% after gallery and SEO revisions.

### Future Enhancements
- Map-based search with clustering.
- User accounts for saved searches and alerts.

> Users can browse, filter, and contact agents effortlessly.
summary: MERN real estate platform with fast search, filters, and lead flows.

title: Financial Website
description:
## Overview

MERN-based financial services site with product catalog (loans, savings, investments), interactive calculators, and secure contact flows. Built for accessibility, performance, and easy content management.

### Goals
- Educate users on products; personalize decisions via calculators.
- Support referral-based growth with team/downline hierarchies.
- Keep all interactions secure and compliant.

### Key Features
- Product pages with comparison tables and FAQs.
- Loan calculators: monthly payment, amortization charts, APR sensitivity.
- Referral tracking: uplines/downlines, commission summaries.
- Contact/eligibility forms with server-side validation.

### Architecture
- React front-end with chart components for data visualization.
- Express/Node API for products, referrals, and submissions.
- MongoDB models: `Product`, `ReferralNode`, `Lead`.
- Queue for notification emails and audit logs.

### Security
- Sanitized inputs, validation schemas, and rate limiting.
- CSRF protection and CORS allowlist.
- Transport-level TLS; no sensitive data stored in front end.

### Accessibility & Performance
- Keyboard navigation and ARIA labels; forms readable by screen readers.
- Code-splitting and image optimization; Lighthouse 90+ targets.

### Role & Responsibilities
- Implemented calculators and charting.
- Modeled referral graph with efficient queries.
- Built secure endpoints and analytics.

### Results
- Forms completion rate +24% after UX pass.
- Average TTFB reduced by 28% with caching layer.

### Future Enhancements
- User portal for application tracking.
- Scenario planner and budgeting tools.
summary: Financial SaaS with calculators, referrals, and secure forms.

title: E Commerce Website
description: ## Overview Shopify storefront customized with **Liquid**, backed by **Express + MongoDB + Node.js** services for integrations, data sync, and custom endpoints. Focused on fast discovery, smooth cart, and high-converting checkout. ### Goals - Scale to thousands of SKUs with fast search. - Provide reliable cart and discount logic. - Reduce checkout friction across payment providers. ### Key Features - Full-text and facet search (collection, tags, price). - Persistent cart with discount codes, shipping estimates, taxes. - Checkout handoff to Shopify Payments and third parties. - Order status pages and email notifications. ### Architecture - Shopify Liquid themes for presentation and sections. - Express services: inventory sync, discount rules, webhook handlers. - MongoDB collections: `Inventory`, `Discount`, `Session`, `Event`. - CDN, caching, and code-splitting for performance. ### Performance - Image lazy-loading, responsive media, prefetch key routes. - Server-side caching of catalog pages; edge caching via CDN. ### Integrations - Webhooks: orders/create, carts/update, inventory_levels/update. - Analytics events for product views, add-to-cart, checkout. ### Role & Responsibilities - Theme customization and componentization. - Built discount engine and shipping estimator. - Implemented webhook processing and monitoring. ### Results - Search response < 200ms (cached). - Conversion rate improved with streamlined cart/checkout. Outcome: Faster browsing and higher conversion rates.
summary: Shopify + Node services: fast search, robust cart, smooth checkout.
